name: Copy TV - minijam 111
description:
Yo!

This is my submission for minijam 111.

The TV dude can summon tv-shows. And they become his enemies, they can even steel your power source. But you can use them for your own needs. Basicaly you, the player, and the TV dude your own enemies:)

Hope you enjoy.

Play fullscreen.

Hint: try mario stuff everywhere :)

(you can jump over heads, and hold jump button)
